one-day postop.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

parathyroid exploration.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

subtotal parathyroidectomy.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

parathyroid hyperplasia.context: This patient is one-day postop open parathyroid exploration with subtotal parathyroidectomy and intraoperative PTH monitoring for parathyroid hyperplasia.

uneventful postoperative night.context: She has had an uneventful postoperative night.

1175 mL of urine.context: She put out 1175 mL of urine since surgery.

calcium level was 7.5.context: Her calcium level was 7.5 this morning.

Tums.context: She has been on three Tums orally b.i.d. and I am increasing three Tums orally q.i.d. before meals and at bedtime.

prednisone.context: I have asked her to increase her prednisone when she goes home.

Lortab Elixir.context: She will be given Lortab Elixir 2 to 4 teaspoons orally every four hours p.r.n. pain, dispensed #240 mL with one refill.
